text: João Manuel Oliveira Rendeiro (22 May 1952 – 13 May 2022) was a Portuguese banker. He was the founder of the Banco Privado Português. On 11 December 2021, Rendeiro was arrested in Durban, South Africa. On 23 February 2022, he was sentenced to ten years in prison. Rendeiro died in May 2022 of suicide from hanging in his serving sentence time in Westville, KwaZulu-Natal, aged 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Bankers Category:Portuguese businesspeople Category:Suicides by hanging
title: João Rendeiro
